scenes.background: Monica glances at Bob and nods slightly.
scenes.description: 'Trying to make everyone happy sounds unrealistic. We should be practical.'

options.text: Balancing everyone's preferences is challenging, but not impossible.
options.analysis: You acknowledged the difficulty but remained optimistic, showing good perception and social skills, though empathy and self-regulation were moderate.

options.text: We can try to find a middle ground without overcomplicating things.
options.analysis: You aimed for a balanced solution, showing good empathy and self-regulation, but social skill and perception were moderate.

options.text: Maybe we should stick to one straightforward plan to avoid conflicts.
options.analysis: You suggested simplifying the plan to avoid issues, showing good empathy and motivation, but social skill and perception were lower.
